Name: Cleric
Description: Devoted servants of the divine, Clerics channel the will of their deities to heal the wounded, protect the weak, and smite the unholy. Whether they serve in temples or on the battlefield, their faith is their greatest weapon.

Abilities.Name: Divine Healing
Abilities.Description: Cast healing spells with +1d4 bonus healing.

Abilities.Name: Turn Undead
Abilities.Description: Force undead creatures within 30 feet to flee (Will save DC 10 + caster level).

Abilities.Name: Radiant Smite
Abilities.Description: Once per combat, add 1d8 radiant damage to a melee attack.

Abilities.Name: Blessing of Resilience
Abilities.Description: Allies within 10 feet gain +1 to AC.

Abilities.Name: Channel Divinity
Abilities.Description: Rechargeable ability to amplify a spell or ability, such as doubling the effect range or duration.

Abilities.Name: Divine Healing Mastery
Abilities.Description: Boost Divine Healing to +2d4 bonus.

Name: Wizard
Description: Masters of arcane lore, Wizards harness the raw power of magic to manipulate the world around them. Though physically frail, their devastating spells make them invaluable.

Abilities.Name: Arcane Focus
Abilities.Description: Reduce mana cost of spells by 1 (minimum 1).

Abilities.Name: Spellweaver
Abilities.Description: Cast two lower-level spells simultaneously once per day.

Abilities.Name: Counterspell
Abilities.Description: Interrupt enemy spellcasting (DC 10 + spell level).

Abilities.Name: Elemental Mastery
Abilities.Description: Choose one damage type (fire, lightning, or cold); gain +1 damage per die.

Abilities.Name: Arcane Shield
Abilities.Description: Once per day, create a barrier absorbing 10 damage.

Name: Warrior
Description: Warriors are formidable combatants, excelling in physical prowess and battlefield tactics. Their unmatched endurance and weapon skills make them the backbone of any party.

Abilities.Name: Power Strike
Abilities.Description: Once per combat, deal an extra 1d10 damage.

Abilities.Name: Battlefield Awareness
Abilities.Description: Gain +2 to initiative rolls.

Abilities.Name: Shield Wall
Abilities.Description: When using a shield, allies within 5 feet gain +1 AC.

Abilities.Name: Enduring Fighter
Abilities.Description: Regain 1d8 HP as a bonus action once per short rest.

Abilities.Name: Weapon Mastery
Abilities.Description: Gain +2 to attack and damage with chosen weapon.

Name: Rogue
Description: Rogues thrive in the shadows, using guile, precision, and agility to outmaneuver foes. Masters of stealth and subterfuge, they excel at exploiting vulnerabilities.

Abilities.Name: Backstab
Abilities.Description: Deal an extra 2d6 damage when attacking from stealth.

Abilities.Name: Evasion
Abilities.Description: Avoid damage from area effects (DC 10 + caster level).

Abilities.Name: Shadow Step
Abilities.Description: Teleport 20 feet in dim light or darkness once per combat.

Abilities.Name: Trap Specialist
Abilities.Description: Automatically detect traps within 10 feet.

Abilities.Name: Ambusher
Abilities.Description: Gain advantage on attack rolls in the first round of combat.

Name: Paladin
Description: Champions of justice, Paladins combine divine power with martial prowess. Their sacred oaths empower them to protect the innocent and smite evil.

Abilities.Name: Lay on Hands
Abilities.Description: Heal an ally for 1d8 + level HP once per long rest.

Abilities.Name: Divine Smite
Abilities.Description: Add 1d8 radiant damage to a melee attack.

Abilities.Name: Aura of Courage
Abilities.Description: Allies within 10 feet are immune to fear.

Abilities.Name: Sacred Vow
Abilities.Description: Gain advantage on saving throws against mind control.

Abilities.Name: Holy Avenger
Abilities.Description: Weapons deal an extra 1d6 radiant damage.

Name: War Mage
Description: Combining martial skill with the destructive power of magic, War Mages are versatile combatants who can adapt to any situation. They use their spells to enhance their physical prowess and devastate enemies on the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Arcane Strike
Abilities.Description: Infuse melee attacks with magic, adding 1d6 elemental damage (fire, lightning, or cold).

Abilities.Name: Spellblade Mastery
Abilities.Description: Once per day, cast a spell as a bonus action.

Abilities.Name: Mana Shield
Abilities.Description: Absorb up to 10 damage by expending 2 MP.

Abilities.Name: Battlecaster
Abilities.Description: Gain advantage on Concentration checks to maintain spells during combat.

Abilities.Name: Elemental Surge
Abilities.Description: Add an extra 1d8 damage to a spell or melee attack once per combat.
